snippet: An Afghan drove a stolen vehicle onto a runway ramp and then ran from it ablaze as a plane carrying Defense Secretary Leon E. Panetta landed Wednesday.
abstract: Defense Secretary Leon E Panetta is not injured when a pickup truck speeds onto a ramp alongside a runway at a British military airfield and crashes into a ditch as Panetta's plane is landing; incident reinforces the lack of security in Afghanistan at the beginning of his two-day visit, the first by a member of the administration since the massacre in Kandahar by a United States service person.

byline.contributor: Graham Bowley and Rod Nordland contributed reporting from Kabul, and Taimoor Shah from Kandahar, Afghanistan.

lead_paragraph: An Afghan drove a stolen vehicle onto a runway ramp and then ran from it ablaze as a plane carrying Defense Secretary Leon E. Panetta landed Wednesday.
